hooks.name: setup-validation
hooks.description: Validates required dependencies on first use
hooks.prompt:
Before proceeding, check if the workflow-toolkit plugin dependencies are installed. This plugin requires:

- **git-town**: Stack management for pull requests
- **gh**: GitHub CLI for PR creation
- **humanlayer**: Thoughts directory synchronization
- **just**: Task runner (optional but recommended)

Run this validation command to check dependencies:

```bash
command -v git-town >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo "✓ git-town installed" || echo "✗ git-town missing"
command -v gh >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo "✓ gh installed" || echo "✗ gh missing"
command -v humanlayer >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo "✓ humanlayer installed" || echo "✗ humanlayer missing"
command -v just >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo "✓ just installed" || echo "✗ just installed (optional)" || echo "✗ just missing (optional)"
```

If any required dependencies are missing, inform the user with installation instructions:

**git-town**: https://www.git-town.com/install
```bash
brew install git-town  # macOS
```

**gh (GitHub CLI)**: https://cli.github.com/manual/installation
```bash
brew install gh  # macOS
```

**humanlayer**: https://docs.humanlayer.dev/installation
```bash
pip install humanlayer
```

**just**: https://just.systems/man/en/chapter_4.html
```bash
brew install just  # macOS
```

Only run this validation ONCE per session. After the first check, do not repeat unless the user explicitly asks.
